sections.heading: Executions; by whom issued; how directed
sections.text: Executions shall be deemed process of the court, and shall be issued by the clerk and directed to the sheriff of the county. They may be directed to different counties at the same time.SourceR.S.1867, Code ยง 474, p. 472;R.S.1913, ยง 8042;C.S.1922, ยง 8983;C.S.1
